title: Can humans survive space travel? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. The evidence that they cannot is from the videos which purport that they do. A lot of the footage is fake. If it were possible to survive in space there would be no fake footage. one then speculates why that is the case. Space is fake.
Can humans survive space travel? Yes. They already did. Went to the moon and back. It happened 50 years ago last year. But on some trips it was touch and go, they nearly didn’t survive.
